text:
Disney Studios in sunny southern California (91201)

Looking for intern, contract, and full time onsite Sr./Principal Data Engineers & System Engineers

http://studiotechdatajob.com/

Expected to have strong Java, Linux and "Cloud" skills. Other skills we're interested in:

* Machine Learning / Deep Learning

* Data Mining / Natural Language Processing / Image Recognition / Statistics

* Apache Spark / Flink

* Mahout / SparkML / GraphX

* Spring Boot

* Confluent.io / Kafka

* Teraform / Docker / Rancher / Packer

* Postgres / Cassandra / Elasticsearch / Apache Titan

* Azkaban / Apache Nifi

* Tableau / Microstrategy

* Python / R
